name: watsonx-node.ts-examples
description: Example usage of SDK as well as external libraries that are implemented with usage of our SDK

scripts.prompt_tuning: npm run build && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_prompt_tuning.ts && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_prompt_generate_text.ts && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_prompt_generate_stream_text.ts
scripts.chat: npm run build && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_chat.ts && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_chat_image.ts && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_chat_stream.ts && run-ts ./src/sdk/example_chat_tools.ts
scripts.rerank: npm run build && npm run run-ts ./src/sdk/example_rerank.ts
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run text_generation && npm run embeddings && npm run chat
scripts.all-ext: npm run build && npm run all && npm run prompt_tuning
scripts.test-install: yalc add @ibm-cloud/watsonx-ai && npm install && npm install @langchain/community@latest @langchain/langgraph@latest
scripts.all-langchain: npm run build && run-ts ./src/external/langchain/chat_conversation.ts && run-ts ./src/external/langchain/chat_image.ts && run-ts ./src/external/langchain/chat_tools.ts && run-ts ./src/external/langchain/call/chat_langgraph.ts
scripts.test-sdk: npm run test-install && npm run build && npm test sdk.test.ts
scripts.test-langchain: npm run test-install && npm run build && npm test langchain.test.ts
scripts.test-all: npm run test-install && npm run build && npm test
